name: Kandy Kush
description: Kandy Kush is a favorite of DNA Genetics’ Reserva Privada line that combines two California classics, OG Kush (thought to be the “Christopher Wallace” cut) and Trainwreck, to make a tasty indica-dominant hybrid (although sativa phenotypes displaying more of the Trainwreck structure have been noted).  Like the name suggests, the flavor is sweet like candy with a strong lemon-Kush scent.  Very popular with medicinal growers, Kandy Kush provides a potent indica high with pronounced pain relief.
descriptionPlain: Kandy Kush is a favorite of DNA Genetics’ Reserva Privada line that combines two California classics, OG Kush (thought to be the “Christopher Wallace” cut) and Trainwreck, to make a tasty indica-dominant hybrid (although sativa phenotypes displaying more of the Trainwreck structure have been noted).  Like the name suggests, the flavor is sweet like candy with a strong lemon-Kush scent.  Very popular with medicinal growers, Kandy Kush provides a potent indica high with pronounced pain relief.

highlightedReviews.text:
Quick onset. Real vivid imagery that's intense and compelling. What a SUPERB high! Everything feels so damn good. Super gelling vibe that's ridiculously chill and lets you just ENJOY LIFE! There's lots of love and genuine compassion towards everything...super rasta, man. Very cheery and actively engaged. Amazingly happy and genuine...heartfelt. Mentally present and capable, but you can get lost in stuff. Strangely just ok for movies. Quite emotional and sensitive in a good way. Surprisingly awake!

Physically, it feels like your getting a perpetual shoulder massage. Real squirmy feel-good. Such a noticeable, excellent body high. Settles you deep in a soft, pillowy space. Touch has a tingling, scintillating feel that evokes a strong emotional reaction.

this strain comes on fast and hard! I experience a little paranoia for about 10 to 15 minutes once it starts to kick in. But once you settle in for the ride it's smooth sailing.... like drifting through the clouds on a magic carpet.

don't let the numbers fool you with this one, mine is 13% THC but will wreck your face üòâ

articles.title: 8 Cannabis Strains That Will Make You Exclaim "Holy Cow!"
articles.author: Rebecca Kelley
articles.text:
Because every day must be deemed a holiday (however pithy) in this digital world, July 12th was ‚ÄúCow Appreciation Day,‚Äù which sounds udderly ridiculous until you realize what our bovine buddies have contributed to the cannabis moo-vement. In addition to a number of cow-themed strains such as Alpha Cow, Madcow, Purple Cow, and Afghan Cow, our comely cattle companions have also inspired an oft-used phrase used in many a Leafly review: ‚ÄúHoly cow!‚Äù
In honor of these dearly beloved domesticated ungulates, here are eight cannabis strains that inspired Leafly reviewers to exclaim ‚ÄúHoly cow‚Äù that I‚Äôve helpfully paired with a corresponding gif.
¬†¬†Durban Poison
‚Äúholy cow I‚Äôm flying. no such thing as stress or anxiety with this strain.‚Äù ‚Äì chaosanon

¬†
¬†¬†Blockhead
‚ÄúI hit some of this from a bong along with some crazy dank lemon skunk and then vaped some of this blockhead (all with a friend) and holy cow i was flying high as a kite.‚Äù ‚Äì chroniccannabisconsumsr

¬†
¬†¬†Kandy Kush
‚ÄúHoly cow was a privilege to try out this strain. [‚Ä¶] Probably the smoothest that I have ever smoked. Was like a dream and to boot the exquisite candy floss flavour it brings is unbelievable!‚Äù ‚Äì TheBigGreenGiant

¬†
¬†¬†Super Green Crack
‚ÄúHoly cow. [‚Ä¶] Never felt more energetic in my life. Just felt like an energy to just get up and start doing shit. ‚Äì hkim823

¬†
¬†¬†Sage N Sour
‚Äúfirst commercially grow strain I‚Äôve ever had, that being said HOLY COW! I ripped three huge hits from a bong and didn‚Äôt feel much yet so I killed the bowl, then it hit me ‚Ä¶. I had to sit down for a sec and as the high progressed I got more and more energetic and super trippy I dont know how else to describe it but like being in. a 3D movie it was weird and then the world got flat and 2D like it was amazing then as I was coming down I felt like a super hero being ably to switch between reality,2D ,And more real than real 3D movie feeling‚Äù ‚Äì COMetalHead

¬†
¬†¬†Lemon Haze
‚ÄúHoly COW. [‚Ä¶] I got it last night, after I had already been smoking so I didn‚Äôt truly know its potential. I woke up this morning and loaded it up, about 2 hours before I had to go to work, with my last hit about 30 minutes before work. It is a GREAT get up and go, but be warned, you might [not] comprehend what you [are] getting up and going to. [‚Ä¶] It was a fun experience though. :3‚Äù ‚Äì thewhitewidow


¬†¬†God Bud
‚Äú‚Ä¶I tried this concentrate and HOLY FREAKNG COW! This is the best indica. I was immediately at ease and calm. Great for relaxing at home.‚Äù ‚Äì ariellm91

¬†
¬†¬†Pandora‚Äôs Box
‚Äú‚Ä¶My new favorite strain. Holy cow man. [‚Ä¶] After decades doing this, I‚Äôm higher than I have been in recent memory. Crazy good stuff‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äì MrFadedGlory

articles.title: Buds of the Future: An American's Peek into Amsterdam's Coffeeshop Culture (Part 2)
articles.author: Matt D
articles.text:
(Part 1 of An American‚Äôs Peek into Amsterdam‚Äôs Coffeeshop Culture is available here.)
During my Amsterdam travels, The Blue Bird coffeeshop stood out from the rest for its personal interest in customer satisfaction. Unlike almost any other coffeeshop, The¬†Blue Bird extends complimentary samples of their competing strains from their own Volcano vaporizer during Cannabis Cup season‚Äîa luxury which Cup judges lack in United States.¬†
At The Blue Bird, two vaporizer¬†operators will greet you with a warm handshake and, while kindly preparing the Volcano for your use, entertain you with friendly banter about their memories of Boston, opinions on other coffeeshops, or whatever else may come up.¬†They‚Äôll give you SO-G Kush, a hybrid between¬†LA Confidential and Kandy Kush grown by Soma Seeds. The word ‚Äúclean‚Äù best describes their strain: smooth to taste and soothing to the soul. It engenders a nice, calm effect and a mild, tranquil sensation.¬†
Conversely, Blue Bird‚Äôs other major competitor, their Afghan Water-Pressed ice hash, braces you with an invigorating and elating buzz (that is, if you can finagle the impressively gummy and malleable wad out of its baggie).¬†While some familiar strains competed in the Amsterdam‚Äôs latest Cannabis Cup (Big Buddha Cheese from Prix D‚ÄôAmi and AK-47 from Mellow Yellow, to cite two well-received examples), the novel strains ultimately walked away as the top winners.¬†
The international marijuana industry, medicinal and otherwise, is rapidly growing as a more¬†respectable, state-of-the-art one. In Amsterdam, coffeeshops constantly experiment as their industry begins to boom, and as the rest of the world takes its steps towards progressivism, the city likely serves as a model for the metropolis of the next generation.¬†
‚ÄúDuring Prohibition,‚Äù explains Franco Loja, star of Strain Hunters, ‚ÄúJack Daniels and Jim Beam¬†were considered like we are today. But now, they‚Äôre Jack Daniels and Jim Beam.‚Äù
Franco‚Äôs right. Evidence points towards a time in which coffeeshops will be no more taboo than bars, even in America, and Flowerbomb Kush no less prominent than Corona.
Because of the High Times Cannabis Cup, major growers and seed companies gain more interest and creativity in the field every year. They consistently introduce better and more effective strains to the world. From DNA Genetic‚Äôs Tangie to the ever so popular San Franciscan GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies), cannabis is becoming a trade for connoisseurs.¬†
In that sense, marijuana is no different than wine in the nuanced ways connoisseurs can appreciate its varieties. Slowly but surely, the stoner culture seems to be evolving into a more legitimate, respectable, and ordinary one. The seeds produced for the Amsterdam Cannabis Cup are becoming the buds of the future.
What will you come up with, Los Angeles?
